ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/11/99 7:42:46 AM Eastern Daylight Time, kaleusi@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/11/99 7:42:46 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
kaleusi@... writes:

<<
Leave it to Verant to screw something up worse than the problem it was
trying to fix (yet again I might add)! Why the hell couldn't they just have
made rubi no drop????? I'm seriously thinking about quitting now. Rubi was
about the last think my DESK had left to look forward to.
>>


Why do you think no DROP would help anything? The armor could be used by so
many different classes, it would make no difference. Few people sell Rubi -
they all wear it. The last thing to look forward to? How do you know? This
is not a static game, there will be new quests and new armors and new items
for SKs some BETTER than Rubi.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
